oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. J.P. Smith letter, 2-19-1913
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: J.P. Smith, Representative from Knoxville, House of Representatives, State of Tennessee, Nashville, letter to Mrs. L. Crozier French, Knoxville, Tenn. February 19, 1913. Supports bills she mentioned in her letter; bill removing the disabilities of married women passed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Politicians; Women's rights; Correspondence; Politics & government;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: J.P. Smith
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
